Package br.com.ufs.orionframework.orion

Class Orion<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.ufs.orionframework.orion.Orion<T>
  • public class Orion<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Orion implements all NGSIv2 operations by using objects java.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Orion()
      Instantiate a Orion object running at localhost:1026 and listener running at 172.18.1.1:4041
      Orion​(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String listener)
      Instantiate a Orion object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.Object batchNotify​(java.lang.Object entities)
      This operation is intended to consume a notification payload so that all the br.com.ufs.orionframework.entity data included by such notification is persisted, overwriting if necessary.
      java.lang.Object batchQuery​(java.lang.Object entities)
      The response is an Array containing one object per matching br.com.ufs.orionframework.entity, or an empty array [] if no entities are found.
      void br.com.ufs.orionframework.batchupdate​(java.lang.Object batchEntities)
      This operation allows to create, update and/or delete several entities in a single batch operation.
      void createEntity​(java.lang.Object en)
      Create a br.com.ufs.orionframework.entity on Orion (require a IP + port from Orion Context Broker)
      void createRegistration​(java.lang.Object registration)
      this operation creates a new context provider registration.

      this operation create a simple br.com.ufs.orionframework.subscription on br.com.ufs.orionframework.orion.
      void createSubscriptions​(Subscription br.com.ufs.orionframework.subscription)
      this operation creates a new br.com.ufs.orionframework.subscription on Orion.
      void deleteRegistration​(java.lang.String registrationId)
      this operation delete the Registration given your registrationId
      void deleteSubscription​(java.lang.String subscriptionId)
      this operation cancels br.com.ufs.orionframework.subscription given a subscriptionId.

      Return the object with the attribute data of the attribute.

      Given an Id and object that represents the br.com.ufs.orionframework.entity required, returns an object updated from Orion.

      this operation update the br.com.ufs.orionframework.subscription (Only the fields included in the request are updated in the br.com.ufs.orionframework.subscription)

        public Orion​(java.lang.String url,
             java.lang.String listener)
        Instantiate a Orion object.
        Parameters:
        url - An IP address + Port String from where the Orion is running.
        listener - An IP address + Port from where the br.com.ufs.orionframework.server is listening the changes that was subscribed.

        java.lang.Exception - for http requests (bad request, forbidden, etc.)

        public Entity[] listEntities​(java.lang.String criteria)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Retrieves a list of entities that match different criteria
        Parameters:
        criteria - can be defined by id, br.com.ufs.orionframework.entitytype, pattern matching (either id or br.com.ufs.orionframework.entitytype).
        Returns:
        An Array with all objects (EntityId and br.com.ufs.orionframework.entityType) registered on br.com.ufs.orionframework.orion. the JSON br.com.ufs.orionframework.entity representation format (described in a “JSON Entity Representation” section) on NGSIv2 docs.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

                                                 java.lang.Object en)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        similar to retrieve the whole br.com.ufs.orionframework.entity. this operation must return only one br.com.ufs.orionframework.entity element. This operation retrieve only attribute fields from br.com.ufs.orionframework.entity, so, id and type not come from the request.

        entityId - Id of the br.com.ufs.orionframework.entity to be retrieved
        en - the object that represents the br.com.ufs.orionframework.entity
        Returns:

        java.lang.Exception - for http requests (bad request, forbidden, etc.)

      • deleteSubscription

        public void deleteSubscription​(java.lang.String subscriptionId)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        this operation cancels br.com.ufs.orionframework.subscription given a subscriptionId.
        Parameters:
        subscriptionId - When a br.com.ufs.orionframework.subscription is created, a message is received on url defined on br.com.ufs.orionframework.subscription This url contains a Location header which holds the br.com.ufs.orionframework.subscription ID: a 24 digit hexadecimal number.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - for http requests (bad request, forbidden, etc.)

        subscriptionId -

      • createSimpleSubscription

        public void createSimpleSubscription​(java.lang.String id,
                                     java.lang.String type,
                                     int port,
                                     java.lang.String ip)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        this operation create a simple br.com.ufs.orionframework.subscription on br.com.ufs.orionframework.orion. this br.com.ufs.orionframework.subscription reacts (trigger notifications) to any changes on attributes. this br.com.ufs.orionframework.subscription expires at 2040-04-05T14:00:00Z.
        Parameters:
        id - an given id from br.com.ufs.orionframework.entity. (can be a regex)
        type - an given type from br.com.ufs.orionframework.entity.
        port - an given port from where the br.com.ufs.orionframework.server is listening the notifications.
        ip - an given ip from where the br.com.ufs.orionframework.server is running.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - for http requests (bad request, forbidden, etc.)

        java.lang.Exception - to http requests.
